channel.title: Possible To Change The Color Of The Hud?
channel.description:
So I have been trying to figure this out for a while, I am wanting to know if it is possible to change the color of the hud, as the Game Directory is missing the file ClientScheme.res.
It would be helpful if someone could help me or supply me information about this.
